domain_webhosting_order_hosting_step_sub: Whether you are looking to launch a blog, a business website, an e-commerce platform or a web application, OVHcloud offers simplicity, security and high performance.
domain_webhosting_order_module_step_titl: Select a pre-installed content management system module
domain_webhosting_order_module_step_subt: Want to build a website without needing the technical expertise? Explore the modules we offer with web hosting plans.
domain_webhosting_order_dns_configuratio: If you set up your new web hosting plan without configuring your DNS zone, your domain name will continue to point to the current records. You will need to configure your DNS zone when your new website is ready. This would be the best choice if you do not wish to cut off a website that is already online.
domain_webhosting_order_payment_step_sub: To confirm your request, please choose a payment method, and accept the Terms & Conditions of Use.
domain_webhosting_order_hosting_step_clo: Launch your website with 1 CPU and 2GB RAM
Launch your business online with 2 CPUs and 8GB RAM
domain_webhosting_order_hosting_step_per: Develop your online store, or existing web projects
Accelerate your growth and develop multiple web projects
Get the very best performance to support your sales
domain_webhosting_order_hosting_step_non: I do not need a web hosting plan with my domain name
domain_webhosting_order_module_step_word: All the simplicity of the most popular CMS, combined with an optimised web hosting plan.
domain_webhosting_order_module_step_pres: If you're looking to create an online store, PrestaShop is the right solution for you.
domain_webhosting_order_module_step_joom: A CMS that allows you to build more complex websites.
domain_webhosting_order_module_step_drup: Customise your website even more by adapting the CMS to suit your needs, rather than changing your needs to suit the CMS.
domain_webhosting_order_module_step_none: I do not want to use any modules
domain_webhosting_order_dns_configuratio: Enable the web hosting plan in the DNS configuration
This option will modify the configuration of the A record on your DNS, and will delete the current configuration.
Enable emails in the DNS configuration
This option will modify the configuration of the A record on your DNS, and will delete the current configuration.
